title: Handle Last-Minute Menu Change
description: A supplier has failed to deliver a key ingredient (e.g., chicken wings) for tonight's game. The F&B manager must update the menu.

tasks.description: Receive notification of the delivery failure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the chicken wings are not available.

tasks.description: Access the menu management system and mark 'chicken wings' as 'sold out' for the event.
Push the update to all POS terminals and digital menus.
tasks.expected_outcome: The item is removed from sale across the venue.

tasks.description: Notify all concession stand managers of the menu change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a broadcast message to all F&B staff.
